# Projects {.section}

## AI Grow — Web & Mobile Application {.card}

### Overview

AI Grow is a community driven web and mobile application designed to help users grow, manage, and monitor fresh greens using controlled greenhouses and self-sustaining home units. It leverages IoT technology and real-time monitoring to optimize plant growth by tracking key parameters such as temperature, humidity, and nutrient levels. The application simplifies crop management and enables users to control processes remotely.

### Technology Stack

- Web + Mobile application  
- IoT integration  
- Real-time monitoring (temperature, humidity, nutrient levels)  
- Remote control capability  


## Bricks+Agent — Property Management Platform (PropTech) {.card}

### Overview

Bricks+Agent is a property management platform that connects property managers, owners, tenants, and trades to streamline maintenance tasks. It includes automated job scheduling, real-time progress tracking, invoicing, and communication tools. Using AI and automation, it improves decision-making and efficiency within a user-friendly interface.

### Technology Stack

- Web platform  
- AI + automation  
- Automated job scheduling  
- Real-time progress tracking  
- Invoicing + communication tools
